title: Computer bugsplats League but not other games such as Rust or Paragon
body: I recently built a pc and have not been able to play LoL. Every time I try to launch it bugsplats on me. All system requirements are met since I can play other games. My GPU drivers are also up to date. Tried reinstialling League and repairing but no change. I dont know what else  to do!

replies.body:
Bugsplats are typically caused by poor system driver interactions or hardware issues. I suggest taking a look at our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of common solutions for this. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
